summary.para: Called when the user selects a text service help menu item.

param.name: hwndParent
param.para: Handle of the parent window. This value can be NULL.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

remarks.para: The text service should not wait for the help UI to be complete before returning from this method.

summary.para: The ITfFnShowHelp interface is implemented by a text service to enable the language bar to place a help command for the text service in the language bar help menu.

remarks.para: The TSF manager obtains this interface from the text service by calling the text service interface with IID_ITfFnShowHelp.
The TSF manager obtains the help menu text by calling the text service's .
